stories.headline: Leading AI Consortium Unveils New Global Safety and Ethics Standards
stories.summary: This initiative aims to guide responsible AI development and deployment, addressing growing concerns over misuse and bias.

stories.headline: Asia's Manufacturing Sector Shows Unexpected Q4 Growth Amid Global Demand
stories.summary: Strong export performance and domestic consumption indicate resilience, potentially offsetting earlier economic slowdown fears.

stories.headline: East Africa Faces Worsening Food Crisis Amid Prolonged Drought Conditions
stories.summary: Millions are at risk of severe hunger as failed rains devastate crops and livestock, prompting urgent international appeals.

stories.headline: Landmark Study Confirms Effectiveness of New Alzheimer's Drug Candidate
stories.summary: Phase 3 trial results show significant slowing of cognitive decline, offering new hope for millions affected by the disease.
